con:method.name: listEnergyInvoices
con:method.con:description: Retrieve a list of invoices for one or more account identifiers

con:parameter.con:name: userId
con:parameter.con:description: The optional user to apply to the adapter call. This allows filtering of resources to only those accessible by the user rather than the whole set of resources available to the principal

con:parameter.con:name: accountIds
con:parameter.con:description: Filter results based on a set of account identifiers

con:parameter.con:name: oldest-date
con:parameter.con:description: Constrain the request to records with issue date at or after this date. If absent defaults to newest-date minus 24 months. Format is aligned to DateString common type

con:parameter.con:name: newest-date
con:parameter.con:description: Constrain the request to records with issue date at or before this date. If absent defaults to current date. Format is aligned to DateString common type

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: Page of results to request (standard pagination)

con:parameter.con:name: page-size
con:parameter.con:description: Page size to request. Default is 25 (standard pagination)

con:parameter.con:name: x-fapi-interaction-id
con:parameter.con:description: An [RFC4122](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122) UUID used as a correlation id. If provided, the data holder must play back this value in the x-fapi-interaction-id response header. If not provided a [RFC4122](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122) UUID value is required to be provided in the response header to track the interaction.

con:parameter.con:name: x-haas-realm-name
con:parameter.con:description: The name of the realm that data is being requested for. Necessary for holders that have multiple brands that should not share data between them.

con:parameter.con:name: x-haas-performance-tier
con:parameter.con:description: This indicates which performance tier according to the Data Standards the request originates

con:parameter.con:name: x-fapi-auth-date
con:parameter.con:description: The time when the customer last logged in to the Data Recipient Software Product as described in [FAPI-R-Draft](https://openid.net/specs/openid-financial-api-part-1-ID2.html). Required for all resource calls (customer present and unattended) if the customer is currently logged. Otherwise optional where the customer has not logged in. Not to be included for unauthenticated calls.

con:parameter.con:name: x-fapi-customer-ip-address
con:parameter.con:description: The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the Data Recipient Software Product.

con:parameter.con:name: x-cds-client-headers
con:parameter.con:description: The customer's original standard http headers [Base64](https://consumerdatastandardsaustralia.github.io/standards/#common-field-types) encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the Data Recipient Software Product. Mandatory for customer present calls. Not required for unattended or unauthenticated calls.

con:representation.con:description: This resource does not exist in the upstream system
The request was well formed but was unable to be shared due to legal reasons
